me.Abhigya.core.menu.action

Class ItemMenuClickAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.Abhigya.core.menu.action.ItemMenuClickAction

  • public class ItemMenuClickAction
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for managing ItemMenu click action in menu.

      void setCursor(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack stack)
      Deprecated. 
      This changes the ItemStack in their hand before any calculations are applied to the Inventory, which has a tendency to create inconsistencies between the Player and the server, and to make unexpected changes in the behavior of the clicked Inventory.

        click_type - Click type
        action - InventoryAction type
        slot_type - InventoryType.SlotType
        slot - Slot index
        raw_slot - Raw slot index
        current - Current clicked ItemStack
        hotbar_key - Hotbar Key

        public boolean isRightClick()
        Returns whether or not the ClickType for this event represents a right click.

        Returns:
        true if the ClickType uses the right mouse button
        See Also:
        ClickType.isRightClick()

      • isLeftClick

        public boolean isLeftClick()
        Returns whether or not the ClickType for this event represents a left click.

        Returns:
        true if the ClickType uses the left mouse button
        See Also:
        ClickType.isLeftClick()

      • isShiftClick

        public boolean isShiftClick()
        Returns whether the ClickType for this event indicates that the key was pressed down when the click was made.

        Returns:
        true if the ClickType uses Shift or Ctrl
        See Also:
        ClickType.isShiftClick()

      • setCursor

        @Deprecated
public void setCursor(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack stack)
        Deprecated. This changes the ItemStack in their hand before any calculations are applied to the Inventory, which has a tendency to create inconsistencies between the Player and the server, and to make unexpected changes in the behavior of the clicked Inventory.
        Sets the item on the cursor.

        Parameters:
        stack - New cursor item
